lines.text: You posin' for pictures? Or you gonna pull the trigger?
Hey you. You hurt anybody else, when this is over, I'm gonna find what you love the most and I'm gonna kill it. Your mother, your father, your dog... don't matter what it is, it's dead.

Listen to me, you big dummy. I'm a cop. I make $12,000 a year, and I'm the highest paid guy on this street. I got $3.65 in my pockets. You want me to, I'll take up a collection. You want a million dollars, you gotta wait!
Look, Mike, you gotta watch what they now call an 'image.' The Daily News is treating the other night like you're Billy the Kid.
That's pretty accurate. I felt like Billy the Kid.
Where were you Monday night, Pauli?
Home, watching skin flicks with my wife.
Spend a lot of time with her, because you're going away real soon.
